thread.title: Overhead Bins That Actually Fit Bags
thread.title_full: Overhead Bins That Actually Fit Bags - WSJ

author: Scott McCartney
title: Overhead Bins That Actually Fit Bags
text:
Seattle
Frustrated at having his own carry-on bag taken from him when overhead bins filled, Boeing Co. engineer Brent Walton asked the question many travelers ask: Why don’t planes have enough bin space for all passengers?
Then he figured out a solution—make bins tall enough so you can turn bags on their side, like standing up books on a shelf rather than laying them flat. Boeing’s new Space Bin increases the number of bags... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
